ticket.title: Add CLI command: apm2 pack compile

in_scope: Add 'pack' subcommand group to apm2 CLI
Add --profile flag for target profile override
Add --output flag for manifest output path
Exit codes: 0 success, 1 budget exceeded, 2 validation error
Human-readable summary to stderr, manifest to stdout

steps: Define Pack subcommand with Compile variant
Implement compile subcommand with args: spec, profile, budget_check, output
Load ContextPackSpec from --spec path using CAC validator
Call compile() and handle CompilationError variants
Format CompiledContextPack manifest as JSON/YAML to stdout
Map error variants to exit codes
Write integration tests with sample pack specs

criteria: apm2 pack compile --spec <path> compiles pack spec
Manifest output is valid CAC-JSON to stdout
Summary output to stderr includes artifact count and budget usage
--output writes manifest to file instead of stdout
Exit code 0 on success, 1 on budget exceeded, 2 on validation error
All tests pass: cargo test pack_compile

notes.security:
CLI validates all inputs through CAC validator before compilation.
No network access during compilation (hermetic).
notes.architecture:
Follows existing CLI pattern in crates/apm2-cli/src/main.rs.
Uses ContextPackCompiler from TCK-00137.
Output format matches CAC-JSON canonicalization (TCK-00127).
Error handling follows clap conventions with structured exit codes.

rules: CTR-0701: Map CompilationError to user-friendly messages
RSK-0701: No panics on malformed input
Use std::fs for spec file reading with proper error handling
CTR-1603: Bounded read for spec file

extend.reason: Add Pack subcommand to Commands enum
